name: Raw Giant Steak
description: Raw Giant Steak is a prime cut of raw meat that drops from various large Fauna . Eating Raw Giant Steak will replenish Health , but there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.
crafted_at: the Butchery Bench using Raw Meat

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Butchery Bench using Raw Meat
